title: Lakshmi Devi Pendant - Goddess of Prosperity Amulet
materials: Accentuated with high-quality cubic zirconia and delicate ruby accents. Showcases expert gold filigree work and meticulous stone setting. Weighs 10.040 g
features: This intricately crafted Lakshmi Devi pendant features a stunning representation of the Goddess seated on a lotus. Note the exceptional craftsmanship in the Nakshi work, bringing the deity's form to life. Surrounded by cubic zirconia halo, its a symbol of wealth and good fortune. It features ruby accents, each placed with precision. Traditional design with a modern touch.
colors: Dominant gold hue complemented by the brilliance of cubic zirconia and the vibrant red accents of the rubies.
occasions: Ideal for daily wear as a protective amulet
weddings (as part of a bridal necklace)
and other auspicious occasions. A perfect gift for seemantham or housewarming ceremonies.
description: Embrace divine blessings with this exquisite Lakshmi Devi pendant. Its exceptional craftsmanship, high-quality materials, and symbolic significance make it a cherished heirloom. Symbolizes prosperity, abundance, and good fortune. Makes an excellent gift for loved ones during auspicious occasions.
